item.title: Minecraft Script
item.description:
GitHub: https://github.evanbueno.com
about: I am currently in the works of creating a minecraft script for easy and fast mangment of minecraft servers using shell. Features include: delete a world (rm) backup something (using zip (world/config/whole server)) install a minecraft server | COMING SOON create a start.sh file (for easy usage) startup a server (requires start.sh) | COMING SOON run a server in screen | COMING SOON updates: Dec 29: added the delete world feature!
